getContract(uint8).details: Returns the address of a contract with a specific role. Throws an error if no contract is set for the specified role.

params.contractType: The role of the contract to retrieve.

returns.contract_: The address of the contract with the specified role.

getManyFinalityScores(uint256,address[]).details: Returns vote count of `consensuses` in the `epoch`.

getManyFinalityScoresById(uint256,addres.details: Returns vote count of `addrs` in the `epoch`.

getManyFinalityVoteCounts(uint256,addres.details: Returns vote count of `addrs` in the `epoch`.

getManyFinalityVoteCountsById(uint256,ad.details: Returns vote count of `cids` in the `epoch`.

getNormalizedStake(uint256,address).details: Returns normalized stake of `cid` in the `period`.

getNormalizedSum(uint256).details: Returns normalized data for given period.

recordFinality(address[]).details: Submit list of `voters` who vote for fast finality in the current block. Requirements: - Only called once per block - Only coinbase can call this method

setContract(uint8,address).details: Sets the address of a contract with a specific role. Emits the event {ContractUpdated}.

params.addr: The address of the contract to set.
params.contractType: The role of the contract to set.

ContractUpdated(uint8,address).details: Emitted when a contract is updated.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

ErrCallerMustBeCoinbase().details: Error of method caller must be coinbase

ErrLengthMismatch().details: Error indicating a length mismatch between two arrays.

ErrOncePerBlock().details: Error indicating that the method is only called once per block.

ErrUnauthorized(bytes4,uint8).details: Error indicating that the caller is unauthorized to perform a specific function.

params.expectedRole: The role required to perform the function.
params.msgSig: The function signature (bytes4) that the caller is unauthorized to perform.
